enhanced_description: Links International is an established HR technology provider and employment agency with over 25 years of experience in Asia, boasting a team of 200+ across the Asia Pacific region. They specialize in 100% in-country delivered HR outsourcing services and offer a unified HR platform for payroll, leave, and workforce management. As an employment agency, they provide tailored recruitment solutions, including retained, contingent, executive search, and temporary & contract services, with a focus on industries such as Human Resources & Administration, Banking, Finance and Accounting, Sales & Marketing, Retail & Luxury, FMCG, Property & Construction, and Industrial recruitment. Their compliant HR solutions adhere to local regulations across 20+ Asian locations, are scalable for businesses of all sizes, and are designed to streamline HR operations, helping clients hire top talent faster and more efficiently.
